title: Exhaust Sound: Flowmaster American Thunder Cat-Back Exhaust on Ford F150 2.7L
description: Hear the sweet sound you can get with a FlowMaster American Thunder Cat-Back (part# - 817725) on this Ecoboost.

asset.title: Flowmaster American Thunder Cat-back Exhaust System - 2015-2016 Ford F150 - 2.7L Ecoboost - 817725
asset.description:
Questions? Give us a call (707) 544-4761

Visit Flowmaster's website: http://bit.ly/1fyGZRh

Flowmaster Part #817725

Test Vehicle: 2015 Ford F-150 2.7L Ecoboost

Application:
2015-2016 Ford F-150 with 2.7L/3.5L EcoBoost, 3.5L TiVCT or 5.0L Engine, All Except Std Cab/Short Bed.

Features:
Flowmaster's American Thunder Cat-back exhaust system for the 2015-2016 Ford F-150 is perfect for the person looking for an aggressive exterior sound level while maintaining a moderate interior sound with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster. This bolt on 409S stainless steel system for the 2.7L, 3.5L V6 and 5.0L V8 engines features 3.00" mandrel bent tubing that flows into a Super 40 muffler and then splits into dual 2.50" tailpipes. The system is finished off with dual 3.50" stainless steel tips that can exit out the rear or out the side. This system fits all cab and bed configurations except Standard Cab/Short Bed models. The exhaust system is manufactured in the USA and is covered by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation.

✓ Stainless Steel Construction
✓ Includes Both Rear and Side Exit
✓ Patented Delta Flow Technology
✓ Mandrel Bent
